full_description:
Riversong Motive 3C SW31 Waterproof Smart Watch

The Riversong Motive 3C SW31 Waterproof Smart Watch is a versatile and feature-packed wearable device designed to enhance your daily activities. With its bigger screen and better display, featuring a 1.28-inch HD colorful display with 240*240 pixel resolution, you can enjoy a more vivid and broader view of your watch's interface. The Motive 3C SW31 is its multiple sports modes, which allow you to track your sports data throughout the day. With 8 different sports modes to choose from, you can easily switch between activities and gain insights into your daily workouts. The watch also prioritizes your health by offering 24-hour heart rate monitoring. Equipped with a built-in optical heart rate sensor and an intelligent algorithm, it accurately tracks your heart rate variations both at rest and during dynamic activities, providing you with valuable information about your cardiovascular health. Worried about water damage? Fear not, as the Motive 3C SW31 is IP68 waterproof. Its professional sealed structure case design ensures that you can wear it worry-free during daily activities, even in wet conditions. The watch keeps you connected with quick access to key messages. With pop-up notifications, you'll receive alerts for incoming calls, SMS messages, and instant messages from various apps directly on your wrist, allowing you to stay informed and connected while on the go. The Riversong Motive 3C SW31 Waterproof Smart Watch combines functionality, style, and durability to provide you with a comprehensive smartwatch experience. Whether you're tracking your workouts, monitoring your heart rate, or staying connected, this smartwatch has you covered.

full_description:
Riversong Motive 6 Pro Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch

The Riversong Motive 6 Pro Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch is a multifunctional device with various health and convenience functions. It has a 1.83-inch full-touch display with a 240 x 280-pixel resolution, 2.5D toughened glass for safety, and a 500 nits high brightness for visibility even in direct sunlight. The watch contains a 200mAh battery that can last up to 10 days of continuous use and 20–30 days of standby time. It also includes a quick charging capability to charge the battery completely in only two hours. The Riversong Motive 6 Pro Smart Watch supports Bluetooth 5.3, so users may pair it with their smartphone and make or receive calls directly from the watch. It also lets users manage their music and camera, as well as receive smart notifications from applications and messaging. The rapid answer function allows users to respond to messages quickly. The watch has an IP68 water resistance classification, which means it can withstand splashes and rain but not submersion or swimming. It has a 24-hour heart rate monitor, an auto sleep tracker, a SpO2 tracker, a stress monitor, and a female health tracker for women, among other features. The Riversong Motive 6 Pro Smart Watch supports a variety of athletic modes, including badminton, jogging, basketball, and jumping, and tracks metrics like calories burned, distance, speed, steps, and others. Users may establish objectives and challenges, track their progress, and design their own watch face from photographs or graphics. The Riversong Motive 6 Pro Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch is a flexible and practical tool for keeping your health and convenience in check.

Bluetooth Calling

With Riversong Motive 6 Pro Smart Watch's smooth Bluetooth connectivity that never leaves you waiting, Bluetooth calling and continually linked ensure that you never miss the chance to connect and interact. You will have everything you need to stay connected on your wrist, regardless of where you are or what you are doing.

AI voice Assistant

Never slow down when you need to stay connected on the go due to Riversong Motive 6 Pro Smart Watch's sophisticated AI Assistant, which is always ready to assist you. You can access the complete array of capabilities without even looking at your wrist thanks to intuitive commands and crystal-clear audio detection.
